titleStmt.title: Bel-vedére, or, The Garden of the muses
titleStmt.author: Bodenham, John, fl. 1600.
Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.

notesStmt.note: Compiled by John Bodenham--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Contains Shakespeare allusions--Cf. Ingleby, The Shakespeare allusion book, I: 72-73 and II: 478, 489-518.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
